member.name: T:Solid.Patterns.Memento.IMemento`1
member.summary: Represents memento object, which is used for restoration of object state.

member.name: M:Solid.Patterns.Memento.IMemento`1.Restore(`0)
member.summary: Restores the object to its previous state.
member.returns: Memento that allows to execute action that's inverse to the restoration
